name: European Solar-Shading Organization vzw
goal: ES-SO, the European Solar Shading Organization, is a non-profit organization (vzw) under Belgian Law. ES-SO's objective is to defend, promote and support the interests of the European solar shading and roller shutter industry and to provide permanent contacts between its members and with the European authorities. ES-SO can demonstrate that the building solutions offered by the solar shading industry substantially contribute to energy savings, to CO2 reduction in buildings as well as to the improvement of the interior climate by avoiding overheating. In this way, the solar shading industry contributes to the 20-20-20 and beyond objectives of the EU.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
EPBD Recast and Concerted Action EPBD
Energy Efficiency Directive, Ecodesign and Energy-labelling Directives
Growth and jobs especiallty for SME's
Climate action
